EmailTemplate.name: Certification-Notification To The Candidate- Agreement
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Certification Completed-Certificaton Number Assigned
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Qualification__c.OwnerFullName}
Congratulations! You have successfully achieved certification as a '{!Qualification__c.Certified_In_Area__c}'. Your {!Qualification__c.Certified_In_Area__c} number is '{!Qualification__c.Certified_In_Area__c}-{!Qualification__c.Name}' If you have any questions, please contact {!Qualification__c.CreatedBy}.
